scripts.clean: git checkout HEAD -- test-ngx-tailwind && git clean -f -d test-ngx-tailwind
scripts.link:schematic: yarn link && cd test-ngx-tailwind && yarn link "ngx-tailwindcss"
scripts.test: yarn clean && yarn test-ngx-tailwind:ng-add && yarn test:test-ngx-tailwind
scripts.test:sandbox: cd test-ngx-tailwind && yarn lint && yarn test && yarn build
